description: Customisable set of fields for items in a tree structure. This app just nails it.
summary: Excellent for organising complex information simply

description:
Website: http://treeline.bellz.org/
Has been made to work with linux and windows
Hierarchical note taking and lists
Making new file has four options:
single line text; Long text; Contact list; Book list; todo list.
https://github.com/doug-101/TreeLine
Simple interface and is an easy to customize data base.
summary: Has all the features of a good PIM

description:
Tras intentar por todos los medios a mi alcance instalar CherryTree en Debian 10, sin exito, me puse a buscar alternativas, TreeLine está muy bien para poner la lista de la compra pero para guardar apuntes con imagnes y algo de formato de texto se queda corta.
Pero si solo buscar guardar notitas en una estructura de árbol es perfecta.
summary: No está mal pero no me sirve
